message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000. I'm confident that you'll find this a competitive price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1150000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a new offer of $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're not willing to budge from your maximum offer, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $1155000. I believe this is the best compromise we can reach considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm not willing to go any higher.
